title: Run Mastra v1 codemod
description:
Run the official Mastra codemod to automatically update code for v1.

**Spec:** `docs/projects/2026-01-26-mastra-1-0-upgrade/2026-01-26-mastra-1-0-upgrade-spec.md`

**Command:**
```bash
npx @mastra/codemod@latest v1
```

**Expected changes:**
- Import paths updated to subpath entry points (`@mastra/core/agent`, `@mastra/core/tools`)
- `RuntimeContext` → `RequestContext` renames
- `createTool` execute signature changes to `(inputData, context)`
- Collection accessor renames (`.get*` → `.list*`)

**After running:**
1. Review the changes made by codemod
2. Run `npx tsc --noEmit` to check for TypeScript errors
3. Document what the codemod changed

⚠️ Do not close until codemod runs successfully and TypeScript compiles.
acceptance_criteria: npx @mastra/codemod@latest v1 runs without errors; npx tsc --noEmit passes after codemod
closed_reason: Codemod ran successfully but made no changes - codebase already uses v1 patterns (subpath entry points like @mastra/core/agent, @mastra/core/tools, @mastra/core/workflows). TypeScript compilation passes. No RuntimeContext references found.
